features.Resolution: (1920 x 1080) FHD IPS 144 Hz, micro-edge, anti-glare
features.Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-13500H (up to 4.7 GHz with Intel® Turbo Boost Technology, 18 MB L3 cache, 12 cores, 16 threads)
features.RAM: 16 GB DDR5-5200 MHz RAM (2 x 8 GB)
features.Storage: 512 GB PCIe® Gen4 NVMe™ TLC M.2 SSD
features.Camera: HP True Vision 1080p FHD camera with temporal noise reduction and integrated dual array digital microphones
features.Audio: Audio by B&O; Dual speakers; HP Audio Boost
features.USB Ports:
1 USB Type-A 5Gbps signaling rate (HP Sleep and Charge)
1 USB Type-C® 5Gbps signaling rate (USB Power Delivery, DisplayPort™ 1.4, HP Sleep and Charge)
2 USB Type-A 5Gbps signaling rate
